arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan head coach Massimiliano Allegri has named his starting line-up for the game against Bologna at San Siro tonight. During his pre-match press conference, Allegri made it clear the danger that Bologna pose, with memories of the Coppa Italia final still fresh. arts.ttl: MP: Why Milan will not wear red and black home shirt against Bologna at San Siro
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher When AC Milan take to the field to face Bologna tonight at San Siro, they will not do so wearing the famous red and black stripes. As MilanPress report, Milan’s third kit makes its season debut tonight despite the fact that the team are at home. arts.ttl: 51 wins at San Siro: All the key stats ahead of Milan vs. Bologna
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan will hope to make it back-to-back wins in Serie A tonight as they welcome Bologna to San Siro. Milan and Bologna have met on 189 previous occasions, with the Rossoneri prevailing in 88 of these, while the Rossoblu have 54 wins to their name, pus 44 draws. arts.ttl: The five key battles that could win or lose the game for Milan against Bologna
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan are hoping to make it two league wins on the spin when they host Bologna at San Siro, also aiming for some Coppa Italia revenge. After losing to Cremonese in round one, Milan managed to get things back on track with a 2-0 win against Lecce last time out. arts.ttl: Milan’s third kit set to make competitive debut vs Bologna in Serie A
arts.sum: Debut night tonight at San Siro. Besides Adrien Rabiot, who will most likely start for the first time in his new chapter, Milan will officially wear their third kit for the first time this season. The kit is not new to fans, who already saw it during the Asia tour in the friendly against Liverpool. […]

arts.ttl: GdS: Milan gave ‘serious consideration’ to Bologna boss Italiano – the background
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan were linked with Vincenzo Italiano in the summer, before Massimiliano Allegri became head coach, and they will face him again tonight. As La Gazzetta dello Sport recall, on May 14th, Bologna beat Milan in the Coppa Italia final. arts.ttl: Calabria reveals Scudetto hope for Milan as well as thoughts on Allegri and Bologna
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Davide Calabria has revealed his hope that AC Milan win the Scudetto this season, while also admitting he remains very attached to the club. arts.ttl: Repubblica: Milan – Bologna: Pulisic part time?
arts.sum: Tonight Milan must win not only to try to keep up with Juventus and Napoli, who are already ahead, but also to avenge the defeat in the Coppa Italia final four months ago.
